contents.name: x
contents.comment: X can be latitude, however in some context it may be a local coordinate system

contents.name: y
contents.comment: Y can be longitutde, however in some context it may be a local coordinate system

contents.name: Z
contents.comment: Location of the related equipment or sensor, locally relative to the boundary or asset Z

description: A physical context in the actual world, GIS, or other that tethers anchors and assets to a space in the physical world.
